name: Highliner
description:
Would you go highlining on Table Mountain without a rope? Need an adrenaline rush but don't want to leave your couch? 

Don't worry, we've got you covered! 

Highlining not only requires great physical skill and agility; in order to balance the body, one must balance the mind. 

So dig deep into your zen, and take the first step out into the abyss.

On starting the game, walk forwards to the line, the tutorial will indicate that you need to press A until you move past the first marker, and the same with D, otherwise you won't be able to step onto the line.

W to move, A and D to balance.

We hope you  enjoy the game, let us know what you think! 

Audio: Mikhaela Faye
Game Design: Ross Borchers
Art: Charlie Martinson
